description: Features How to select a webcamLogitech Webcam C260Connect in a big way with widescreen callingSeeing more of family and friends has never been easier with ultra-clear and ultra-smooth video calling in 16:9 widescreen. The Logitech Webcam C260 makes it a breeze for you to connect in a bigger way, thanks to one-click calling that fills the screen with crisp, colorful you.What you'll seeClear, smooth video your built-in webcam can't match. Family and friends, happy to see more of you in dazzling widescreen. Free and easy video calling with included Logitech Vid HD.
title: Logitech C260 Webcam
